In-Fighter.name: Legendary Node
In-Fighter.title: In-Fighter
In-Fighter.description: When you Dodge or Block an attack you gain +2% increased Attack Speed and x1% increased Damage for 5 seconds, stacking up to 9 times.

Spiney Skin.name: Legendary Node
Spiney Skin.title: Spiney Skin
Spiney Skin.description: When you use a Cooldown you gain 20% Thorns for 5 seconds.

Viscous Shield.name: Legendary Node
Viscous Shield.title: Viscous Shield
Viscous Shield.description: You do x1% increased damage for each 3% of your Maximum Life you have as a Barrier.

Viscous Shield.name: Magic Node
effects: 3% Damage Reduction while You Have a Barrier

Viscous Shield.name: Magic Node
effects: 3% Damage Reduction while You Have a Barrier

Viscous Shield.name: Rare Node
Viscous Shield.title: Bristle
effects: 6% Damage Reduction while You Have a Barrier

Viscous Shield.name: Magic Node
effects: 3% Damage Reduction while You Have a Barrier

Bitter Medicine.name: Legendary Node
Bitter Medicine.title: Bitter Medicine
Bitter Medicine.description: When you Heal for 100% of your Maximum Life, deal [X] damage to Close enemies. This damage is increased by your Healing Received bonus.

Revealing.name: Legendary Node
Revealing.title: Revealing
Revealing.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 30% chance to Knock Down Vulnerable enemies. You deal x30% increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.

Drive.name: Legendary Node
Drive.title: Drive
Drive.description: After moving 10 meters, you deal x3% increased damage for 10 seconds. This can stack up to 10 times.

Convergence.name: Legendary Node
Convergence.title: Convergence
Convergence.description: You deal bonus damage equal to x20% of your 2 highest bonuses to damage types combined, up to 30% total.

Sapping.name: Legendary Node
Sapping.title: Sapping
Sapping.description: When you cast 3 Gorilla, Jaguar, Eagle, or Centipede skills with the same spirit in a row, restore 15% of your Vigor and deal x30% increased damage for 5 seconds.
